name: Liminal Library
description:
Thank you for playing Liminal Library!

If you enjoyed our game, please consider supporting your local library. Many libraries allow you to get a digital card and borrow ebooks and audiobooks online! A library membership also unlocks free subscriptions to documentary and independent film streaming platforms.

For decades, libraries have been a space where everyone can access knowledge for free. In this day and age, when books are available online and the answers to most questions can be found on the Internet, many consider libraries to be obsolete. That is far from the case.

To learn more about the role that public libraries still play in our society, consider reading the following articles:

  • “Why public libraries are still essential in 2018” from Vox: https://www.vox.com/culture/2018/7/24/17603692/public-libraries-essential-forbes-amazon.
  • “Neil Gaiman: Why our future depends on libraries, reading and daydreaming” from The Guardian: https://www.theguardian.com/books/2013/oct/15/neil-gaiman-future-libraries-reading-daydreaming. 
  • “How public libraries help build healthy communities” from Brookings: https://www.brookings.edu/blog/up-front/2017/03/30/how-public-libraries-help-build-healthy-communities/.
